  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon inspection unprocessed hazmat soiled. Outer package soiled, inside package 2 containers of Corrosive Liquid Disinfectant 1.4 Liter had unsecured lids/ pump spout. Corrosive liquid disinfectant leaking from spout and lid. No packing material.
